results.title: The day the earth was sold
results.creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas, Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 35 of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
DoDo is a kid with extraordinary powers, and he knows how to use them. When he arrives on earth, DoDo has a series of adventures with Compy the Computer Bird and Professor Fingers, who can invent anything. From Hollywood to Loch Ness, from the Pyramids to Paris, DoDo and his pals have fun at the movies, help Interpol capture some spies, find sunken treasure, visit a rodeo and still have time to keep the world from being sold. In this episode DoDo helps the Pentagon in tracking down a signal from outer space and a possible invasion on the planet Earth by the Sandites from the planet Sandy. Animated by Harold Whitaker, John Smith, Tony Whitehouse, Tony Guy, Bruno Bozzetto, Arthur Humberstone.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joy Batchelor, John Halas, Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films

results.title: Professor Finger builds a bridge
results.creator_credit: Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
Dodo and the bird come to the rescue of the Professor when his new inventions of a plastic bridge over a ravine cannot take the stress. The remains of the bridge become a ferry instead.

results.title: DoDo buys a space pig
results.creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas, Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
DoDo is a kid with extraordinary powers, and he knows how to use them. When he arrives on earth, DoDo has a series of adventures with Compy the Computer Bird and Professor Fingers, who can invent anything. From Hollywood to Loch Ness, from the Pyramids to Paris, DoDo and his pals have fun at the movies, help Interpol capture some spies, find sunken treasure, visit a rodeo and still have time to keep the world from being sold. In this episode DoDo and Professor Fingers cause havoc at a cosmic animal show when Professor Fingers becomes jealous over DoDo buying a lovable long-eared space pig. Animated by Harold Whitaker, John Smith, Tony Whitehouse, Tony Guy, Bruno Bozzetto, Arthur Humberstone.

results.title: DoDo and the Touchies
results.creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas, Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 52 of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
DoDo is a kid with extraordinary powers, and he knows how to use them. When he arrives on earth, DoDo has a series of adventures with Compy the Computer Bird and Professor Fingers, who can invent anything. From Hollywood to Loch Ness, from the Pyramids to Paris, DoDo and his pals have fun at the movies, help Interpol capture some spies, find sunken treasure, visit a rodeo and still have time to keep the world from being sold. In this episode DoDo helps the inhabitants on the planet Laugh/Cry who are under threat of invasion by inhabitants of another planet known as the Touchies. Animated by Harold Whitaker, John Smith, Tony Whitehouse, Tony Guy, Bruno Bozzetto, Arthur Humberstone.

results.title: The Discovery of Fingercillin
results.creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas, Robert Maxwell, Joseph E. Levine, Anroste Films and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “DoDo: the kid from outer space”.
DoDo is a kid with extraordinary powers, and he knows how to use them. When he arrives on earth, DoDo has a series of adventures with Compy the Computer Bird and Professor Fingers, who can invent anything. From Hollywood to Loch Ness, from the Pyramids to Paris, DoDo and his pals have fun at the movies, help Interpol capture some spies, find sunken treasure, visit a rodeo and still have time to keep the world from being sold. In this episode Professor Fingers, wanting to become famous, discovers a new antibiotic which will hopefully cure an Arabian sheik’s only son who has been ill for over a year with a mysterious disease. DoDo and the Professor travel to Arabia with the cure and are rewarded for their work. Animated by Harold Whitaker, John Smith, Tony Whitehouse, Tony Guy, Bruno Bozzetto, Arthur Humberstone.

results.title: Pergolas
results.creator_credit: Rod Parker and Do It Yourself Videos
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Instructional video which shows how to build a pergola with professional results. After the desired location is determined the viewer is instructed how to measure and design the pergola and what council permits may be required. Timber, hardware and tool requirements are discussed before a step-by-step demonstration of preparation and construction techniques.

results.title: Tiling floors
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Michael Byrne demonstrates how to prepare an ideal surface for tiling, how to apply adhesive for proper coverage, how to cut tile efficiently, use decorative borders, mix mortar, incorporate expansion joints and shape a shower recess so it won’t leak. This program is companion to the book, “Setting Ceramic Tile” (The Taunton Press, 1987) and page references appear in the corners of the screen.

results.title: Timber fences and gates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Enables the beginner to construct fences and gates with professional results. It introduces various fencing and gate designs, advising the viewer on material and tool requirements. It suggests wood and general preparation techniques and finally advises on the construction and assembly of gates and fences.
